title: Product Custom Fields

fields.label: Download Data Sheet
fields.name: download_data_sheet
fields.instructions: Upload a data sheet file (PDF, DOC, etc.) that customers can download. This field supports both single and variation products.

fields.label: Installation Guide
fields.name: installation_guide
fields.instructions: Upload an installation guide file (PDF, DOC, etc.) that customers can download. This field supports both single and variation products.

fields.label: Coverage (M²)
fields.name: coverage_m2
fields.instructions: Enter the coverage area in square meters that this product covers. This field supports both single and variation products.

fields.label: Panel Weight (kg)
fields.name: panel_weight_kg
fields.instructions: Enter the weight of the panel in kilograms. This field supports both single and variation products.

fields.label: Show Coverage Calculator
fields.name: show_coverage_calculator
fields.instructions: Enable or disable the coverage calculator for this product. When enabled, customers can calculate the quantity needed based on area measurements.

description: Custom fields for WooCommerce products including download files, coverage area, and panel weight specifications.
